languages.text: "Помните? Там был юноша, которого горе и смятение толкнули на дерзкие слова в ваш адрес".

traits.locale_text: "Помните? Там был юноша, которого горе и смятение толкнули на дерзкие слова в ваш адрес".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Do you remember? There was a young man whose grief and confusion had driven him to insolence."
languages.original_text: "Помните? Там был юноша, которого горе и смятение толкнули на дерзкие слова в ваш адрес".

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember? There was a young man whose grief and confusion had driven him to insolence."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember? There was a young man whose grief and confusion had driven him to insolence."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember? There was a young man whose grief and confusion had driven him to insolence."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember? There was a young man whose grief and confusion had driven him to insolence."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember? There was a young man whose grief and confusion had driven him to insolence."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “你还记得吗？当时有个年轻人由于过于痛苦、困惑，对你说了些无礼的话。”
languages.original_text: "Do you remember? There was a young man whose grief and confusion had driven him to insolence."

traits.locale_text: “你还记得吗？当时有个年轻人由于过于痛苦、困惑，对你说了些无礼的话。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Lo recuerda? Hubo un joven al que la confusión y el dolor llevaron a la insolencia».
languages.original_text: "Do you remember? There was a young man whose grief and confusion had driven him to insolence."

traits.locale_text: «¿Lo recuerda? Hubo un joven al que la confusión y el dolor llevaron a la insolencia».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「覚えておられますか？悲しみと混乱から、横柄な態度を示した若者がいたことを」
languages.original_text: "Do you remember? There was a young man whose grief and confusion had driven him to insolence."

traits.locale_text: 「覚えておられますか？悲しみと混乱から、横柄な態度を示した若者がいたことを」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch? Da war ein junger Mann, den Trauer und Verwirrung trotzig gemacht hatten."
languages.original_text: "Do you remember? There was a young man whose grief and confusion had driven him to insolence."

traits.locale_text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch? Da war ein junger Mann, den Trauer und Verwirrung trotzig gemacht hatten."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous souvenez-vous de ce moment ? Dans son chagrin et sa confusion, l'un des jeunes gens présents s'était montré insolent envers vous. »
languages.original_text: "Do you remember? There was a young man whose grief and confusion had driven him to insolence."

traits.locale_text: « Vous souvenez-vous de ce moment ? Dans son chagrin et sa confusion, l'un des jeunes gens présents s'était montré insolent envers vous. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Kederine teslim olan, kafası karışmış bir genç vardı... Bu yüzden küstahlığa sürüklenmişti. Hatırlıyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "Do you remember? There was a young man whose grief and confusion had driven him to insolence."

traits.locale_text: "Kederine teslim olan, kafası karışmış bir genç vardı… Bu yüzden küstahlığa sürüklenmişti. Hatırlıyor musun?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
